title: Bug Squasher
description: [Name] quickly debugs a teammate's code flawlessly.

title: API Wrangler
description: [Name] successfully integrates a complex API on the first try.

title: All-Nighter
description: [Name] pulls an all-nighter coding session.

title: Energy Drink Enthusiast
description: [Name] consumes more energy drinks than anyone else.

title: The Influencer
description: [Name] live-tweets the event, attracting attention from tech influencers.

title: Sticker Swag Collector
description: [Name] covers their laptop in the most event stickers.

title: Code Mentor
description: [Name] takes time to help out a newbie with coding basics.

title: The Salesman
description: [Name] networks with every sponsor at the event.

title: Impromptu Presenter
description: [Name] is roped into giving an unplanned demo to onlookers.

title: Pizza Predator
description: [Name] is first in line when the pizza arrives and grabs the coveted first slice.

title: The Debugger
description: [Name] finds a critical bug in someone else's project that they missed.

title: Caffeine Connoisseur
description: [Name] critiques the coffee quality with expert attention to detail.

title: The Zen Coder
description: [Name] remains unflappably calm amid the chaos of the hackathon.

title: The Napper
description: [Name] takes a power nap and wakes up with a brilliant solution.

title: Wireframe Wizard
description: [Name] sketches a perfect wireframe of the app on a napkin.

title: The Charmer
description: [Name] smooth-talks their way into borrowing equipment the team needs.

title: Git Guru
description: [Name] rescues the team from a near-disastrous git merge conflict.

title: Hackathon Historian
description: [Name] documents the entire event with photos and detailed notes.

title: The Night Owl
description: [Name] is the last one standing as the event wraps up.

title: Wildcard Winner
description: [Name] implements a feature that was not in the original plan but becomes the highlight of the project.
